long_description: The summer-weight, shorty-short Patagonia Island Hemp Shorts for women let you totally relax in a soft hemp and organic cotton blend. Soft hemp/organic cotton fabric has a linen-like drape. Waistband offers a drawstring to fine-tune the fit, and loops for your own belt; zip fly has double-button closure. Drop-in front pockets show a triple-needle stitch detail; back patch pockets have a button closure. Patagonia Island Hemp Shorts for women have a 4 in. inseam.
short_description: The summer-weight, shorty-short Patagonia Island Hemp Shorts for women let you totally relax in a soft hemp and organic cotton blend.
